high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the the desk.
Pick up the phone to the left of the lamp.
Take a step to the right.
anns.task_desc: Examine a phone next to the light of a lamp  on the desk.

high_descs: Turn around then head towards the wooden desk to the left of the plant
Pick up the phone sitting on top of the desk to the left of the lamp
Carry the phone while moving towards the lamp on top of the desk
Turn on the lamp while holding the phone
anns.task_desc: Carry a phone to the lamp, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn around and face the table near the phone.
Pick the phone up from the table.
Move to the right and stand in front of the lamp on the right side of the table.
Turn the lamp on the table on.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a phone in hand.
